conclusion: Analyze scenario where car A approaches colored blocks to determine collision and final position.
Car A is approaching from the right side of the image.
Blocks directly in front of car A are the red block and the blue block.
Car A will collide with the red block first.
Blue block is further away and not directly in path of collision.
After colliding with red block, car will move towards blue block.
Car will continue moving towards red block as blue block is further away.
Car's speed and distance to blocks determine trajectory and final position.
Car's power and deflection affect travel distance after collision.
Car will stop at the red block as it is directly in front.
Car will collide with red block first, continue towards blue block, and stop at red block.
